review: When I get tired of Amazon Prime, Google Chromecast is a nice fall back for my viewing pleasure (though I have to admit that I still like Amazon Prime better than most of the apps on Chromecast).One of the advantages of Chromecast is that it takes up so little space.There are many apps, and there will be more becoming available as time passes.This device is a wonderful addition to my television, and you don't risk very much money to try it out.I recommend it to you so that you have additional resources for your daily viewing pleasure.John
